title: Next Chat
description: Chat App created with NextJs and React for the frontend and Firebase for the backend. The page allows you to register/log in and talk to any registered user!

title: F1 E-Commerce
description: Fullstack e-commerce, created using React and Material UI for the Frontend, Firebase for the Backend and integrated with Mercado Pago.

title: Miusik
description: Miusik is the best platform to play music! Listen to your favorite artists, save your favorite songs and create your own playlists!

title: To-Do List
description: A simple task list that allows you to add reminders that persist in each user's local memory

title: Dental Clinic
description: CRUD app for a dental clinic. It allows you to call the Java API to view, create, edit or delete clinic patients.

title: Space Tourism
description: Space Tourism is a challenge from Frontend Mentor, whose proposal was to make a page with HTML, CSS and JS. I chose to do it with React and Sass to learn more
